title: Senior Life Insurance Advisor
description: We are seeking an experienced Life Insurance Advisor to join our London team. The ideal candidate will have 5+ years of experience in insurance sales, strong client relationship skills, and a proven track record of meeting sales targets.

title: Junior Financial Advisor
description: Entry-level position for a motivated individual looking to start a career in financial advisory. Full training provided for the right candidate with strong analytical skills and customer service orientation.

title: Compliance Officer
description: Experienced compliance professional needed to oversee regulatory compliance across European operations. Strong knowledge of EU insurance regulations required.

title: IT Support Specialist
description: Technical support role for our growing Belgrade operations. Responsible for maintaining IT infrastructure and supporting staff with technical issues.
